name: NAV.no Job Listing Scraper
description: Extract job listings from arbeidsplassen.nav.no search results
navigation_goal: Navigate through the NAV job search results page. FIRST: If you see a cookie consent banner, dismiss it. THEN: Extract all visible job postings. Handle pagination by clicking 'Neste' (Next) button if available to get more results.
data_extraction_goal:
Extract the following information from each job listing:
1. Job title (stillingstittel)
2. Company/Employer name (arbeidsgiver)
3. Location (arbeidssted)
4. Job posting URL (full link to job details)
5. Short description/summary
6. Application deadline (søknadsfrist) if visible
7. Employment type (stillingstype: fast, vikariat, etc)
8. Extent (omfang: heltid, deltid)

Return results as a JSON array with objects containing: {title, company, location, url, description, deadline, employment_type, extent}

url.description: Full URL to job posting on NAV

error_code_mapping.PAGINATION_FAILED: Failed to navigate to next page
error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Failed to extract job data from NAV page
